Hola mi nombre es Arcenia, soy comerciante, cuento con un negocio en mi casa de habitación de venta de ropa y calzado, tengo varios años de dedicarme a este tipo de actividad la que realizo de manera ambulante y me genera ingresos para cumplir mis compromisos y cubrir mis gastos familiares, tomando en cuenta que soy madre soltera y tengo un hijo.

loans.use: to buy shoes, pants, socks, shirts, and other items

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.en:
My name is Miguel P., and I am a taxi driver. I began this work one year ago. My clients are very good since I am located near the national university. I earn money through my business in order to support my family. My goal is to keep my taxi in good condition in order to better serve my clients. With the money I earn, I plan to save in oder to buy another car to use as a taxi and in oder to provide food for my two daughters and my wife.

Translated from Spanish by Alison Rives, Kiva Volunteer.

Mi nombre es Miguel P. me dedico a transportar personas en mi taxi, tengo mi negocio hace un año, mis clientes son muy buenos ya que estoy ubicado en el punto de taxis de la universidad nacional, mi negocio me genera ingresos para el sustento de mi familia, mi meta es tener mi taxi en buenas condiciones para prestar un mejor servicio a mis clientes y con las gancias que obtenga ahorrar para comprarme otro carro para ponerlo de taxi asi mismo alimentar a mis dos hijas y mi esposa.

loans.use: to buy oil, filters, and other car parts

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
My name is Elizabeth. For several years now, I have been selling sweets and bread. I run my business from my centrally-located home. The income I earn allows me to cover family expenses as well as other obligations I have with my suppliers.

Translated from Spanish by Alison Rives, Kiva volunteer.

Mi nombre es Elizabeth, cuento con un negocio de venta de golocinas y elaboración de pan de levadura en mi casa de habitación, ubicada en el centro de mi comunidad, tengo varios años de dedicarmen a este tipo de actividad la que me genera ingresos para cubrir mis gasto familiares y demas compromisos con los proveedores.

loans.use: to buy flour, eggs, sugar, lard, margarine, vegetables, meat, etc.

loans.name: María Guadalupe

texts.en:
María Guadalupe lives in the city of Monterrey, Nuevo León. She is a married mother of two children. She began to sell cosmetics via catalog after the marriage of her children. Her husband’s income alone was not enough, as they were no longer receiving support from their children. María Guadalupe works harder every day to help her husband and cover the costs of the household, as well as to continue to grow professionally. She recently received a promotion and if she continues to increase her sales she will be able to achieve even more.

For these reasons, she is in need of a loan of $750 to acquire more merchandise and continue to increase her sales volume. Don’t hesitate any longer. María Guadalupe needs and sincerely appreciates your support.

Translated from Spanish by Leo Duran, Kiva Volunteer.

María Guadalupe vive en la localidad de Monterrey Nuevo León, es casada y madre de dos hijos. Ella comenzó a vender cosméticos por catálogo debido a que sus hijos se casarón y solamente con el sueldo de sus esposo no le alcanzaba, pues ya no reciben el apoyo de sus hijos como antes. Cada día María Guadalupe trabaja más duro para ayudar a su esposo y poder solventar los gastos de la casa y también para seguir creciendo profesionalmente, ya que recientemente la ascendieron de puesto y si continua vendiendo más puede lograr algo mejor.

Es por todo esto que ella requiere de un préstamo por l cantidad de $ 750 DLLS, mismos que utilizará para comprar más mercancía y seguir aumentando su volumen de ventas. No lo dudes más María Guadalupe necesita de tu apoyo y te lo agradece sinceramente.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.en:
My name is Juan Francisco, and my main economic activity is as a taxi driver in my city. I have one taxi with the operating number 373. I have done this job for many years in order to cover family expenses and maintain my car in good condition. However, due to many car problems that I recently discovered, I need your help.

Translated from Spanish by Alison Rives, Kiva Volunteer.

Mi nombre es Juan Francisco, mi actividad principal es el transporte de Taxi en mi ciudad, cuento con una unidad de taxi con numero de explotación No. 373, tengo varios años de dedicarme a este tipo de actividad la que me genera ingresos cubrir los gastos familiares y darle el mantenimiento al vehiculo, pero en vista que actualmente se le detectaron varios fallas me veo en la obligación de solicitar su apoyo.

loans.use: to buy 4 tires, a fan, bolts, and rear shock absorbers

loans.name: Juan

texts.en:
Juan F. C. is a married father of 3 children. Twenty years ago, he started his school transportation business while working as a waiter in a restaurant. With part of his earnings, his wife opened a fruit store, which they had to shut down after a short time due to unexpectedly low earnings. Through hard work and dedication, Juan now has 3 transport vehicles and an employee to help him. Thanks to the business, he has been able to offer his children a professional education and consequently a more promising future with better opportunities.

At this time, Juan is in need of a loan in the amount of $650 to pay for vehicle parts and renew vehicle documentation. Don’t hesitate any longer — you can help Juan and his family. He will sincerely appreciate it.

Translated from Spanish by Leo Duran, Kiva Volunteer.

Juan F. C. es casado y padre de 3 hijos, hace 20 años el comenzó con su negocio de transporte escolar, mientras también trabajaba como mesero en un restaurante, con parte de las ganancias de sus actividades su esposa inició con el negocio de una frutería, sin embargo al poco tiempo tuvieron que cerrarla puesto que no les dio los resultados que esperaban. Luego de arduo trabajo y dedicación ahora Juan tiene tres transportes y un empleado que le ayuda. Gracias a esta actividad ha podido brindarles a su hijos educación profesional y por ende un futuro con mejor oportunidades y más prometedor.

En este momento Juan requiere de un préstamo por la cantidad de $ 650 DLLs, mismos que utilizará para compara refacciones y renovar documentos de los vehículos. No lo dudes más, tu puedes ayudar a Juan y su familia, el te lo va agradecer sinceramente.

loans.use: Purchase vehicle parts

loans.name: Fidelia Amparo

texts.en:
My name is Fidelia Amparo, and I run a small local store from home. I have been running this business for a few years now which allows me to take care of my family, paying our expenses and other obligations. The most help I receive is the support of my childern during their free time.

Translated from Spanish by Alison Rives, Kiva Volunteer.

Mi nombre es Fidelia Amparo, mi actividad princial es el comercio cuento con una pequeña pulperia, ubicada en mi casa de habitación, tengo varios años de dedicarmen a este tipo de negocio, gracias esta actividad puedo antender a mi familia y contribuir con los gastos familiares y demas compromisos, lo mas importante que cuento con el apoyo de mis hijos en su tiempo libre.

loans.use: to buy rice, lard, sugar, beans, ham, flour, dairy products, etc.

loans.name: Telma Lizzet

texts.en:
Hello, my name is Telma, and I hope to start a home business in the sale of bread and nacatamales. I have dedicated myself as a traveling salesperson to this type of business for several years. I hope to generate revenue to contribute to familial expenses, as well as generate even larger revenues so that I can offer my children a better way of life.

Translated from Spanish by Marco Alves, Kiva Volunteer.

Hola mi nombre es Telma, cuento con un negocio de Elaboración y venta de pan y nacatamales, (productos para el consumo Humano) ubicado en mi casa de habitación, tengo varis años de dedicarmen a este tipo de negocio el que distribuyo de manera ambulante,actividad que me genera ingresos para contribuir con los gastos familiares, longrando asi mejores ingresos y de esa manera poder ofrecer a mis hijos un mejor nivel de vida.

loans.use: To purchase flour, eggs, sugar, lard, margarine, meats, corn, etc.

texts.en:
My name is Ana Berta, and I hope to start a home business in the sale of Tigo y Claro cellular phone calling cards. This work and its generated revenue will allow me to attend to my family and contribute to their expenses while also offering education and greater opportunities to my children.

Translated from Spanish by Marco Alves, Kiva Volunteer.

Mi nombre es Ana Berta, cuento con un negocio de venta de Tarjetas para celulares Tigo y Claro, ubicado en mi casa de habitación, actividad que me permite atender a mi familia y que me genera ingresos para contribuir con los gastos de mi familia, de esa forma podemos ofrecer educación a mis hijos logrando asi mejores oportunidades para ellos.

loans.use: To purchase Tigo y Claro phone cards of different denominations.

loans.name: Reyna  Ester

texts.en:
My name is Reyna Ester, and I hope to start a small company in the production of doughnuts that I will distribute throughout various schools in my town. With the help of this business I will be able to provide for my family, especially now that I am a single mother. This work will generate revenue to cover familial expenses. Right now, I need to buy sufficient high-grade material to prepare for the ever-nearing school year, a time during which the volume of sales increases.

Translated from Spanish by Marco Alves, Kiva Volunteer.

Mi nombre el Reyna Ester, cuento con una micro empresa de elaboración de Donas, las que distribuyo en las diferentes encuelas de mi ciudad, gracias a este negocio puedo sacar adelante a mi familia ya que soy madre soltera y esta actividad me genera ingreso para cubrir los gastos familiares, actualmente necesito compra suficiente matearia prima, tomando en cuenta que se aproximan las clases y el volumen de venta es mayor.

loans.use: To purchase eggs, flour, margarine, sugar, fine salt, cornstarch, miscellaneous paper products, yeast, vanilla, olive oil, and butter.

loans.name: Francisco Javier

texts.en:
Francisco is a married father of 3 children. For the past 30 years, he has dedicated himself to the autobody business. For many years he worked as an employee for a firm. However, about 12 years ago he decided to start his own business, since what he earned as an employee was not enough to meet the basic needs of his family. He runs the business out of his own home and works hard every day to grow and be able to offer his children the education they require.

He now hopes to receive a loan in the amount of $650 to purchase paint and materials for his work. You have the chance to help him — don’t hesitate any longer and support Francisco and his family.

Translated from Spanish by Leo Duran, Kiva Volunteer.

Francisco es casado y padre de 3 hijos, el se dedica desde hace 30 años a la hojalatería, pues durante muchos años trabajó como empleado para una empresa, sin embargo hace 12 años aproximadamente decidió iniciar su negocio, ya que lo que ganaba como empleado no le alcanzaba para satisfacer todas las necesidades básicas de su familia. El negocio lo tiene en su propio domicilio y trabaja arduamente cada día para poder crecer y poder brindar a sus hijos la educación que requieren.

El ahora tiene la esperanza de poder recibir un crédito por la cantidad e $ 650 DLLS, mismos que utilizará para comprar pintura y material que requiere para su trabajo. Tú tienes la posibilidad de ayudarlo, no lo dudes más y apoya a Francisco y a su familia.

loans.use: Purchase materials

loans.name: Yamina Antonia

texts.en:
Yamina is a very active and entrepreneurial woman. She is married with 3 children and lives in the city of Mérida, Yucatán. Her husband is a taxi driver and therefore has no fixed income. This situation has led to financial difficulties. For this reason, 17 years ago she decided to open a small grocery shop in her own home. At first her selection was small, but with time she continued to grow. Thanks to the business, she has been able to help her husband during hard times. Because of this she works hard every day.

At this time she is in need of a loan of $925 to acquire more merchandise for her clientele, thereby allowing her business to grow. Don’t hesitate any longer. She needs your help and sincerely appreciates your support.

Translated from Spanish by Leo Duran, Kiva Volunteer.

Yamina es una mujer muy activa y emprendedora, es casada, tiene 3 hijos y viven en la localidad de Mérida, Yucatán. Su esposo es taxista por lo cual no tiene un ingreso fijo, esta situación ha generado dificultades económicas, es por ello que hace 17 años ella decidió abrir un atienda de abarrotes en su propio domicilio. En un comienzo no tenía mucho surtido, pero conforme fue pasando el tiempo fue creciendo. Gracias a esta actividad ha podido apoyar a sus esposo en lo momentos complicados, es por ello que trabaja arduamente cada día.

En este momento ella requiere de crédito de $ 925 DLLS para poder surtir más mercancía que ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera hacer crecer su negocio. No lo dudes más ella te necesita y agradece tu apoyo sinceramente.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise

loans.name: Rosa

texts.en:
Hard-working, enthusiastic and responsible: these are just some of the characteristics that define Rosa. She divorced a few years ago and was faced with supporting her 3 children. Due to this difficult situation, she decided to start her own business with a bit of capital, renting chairs, tables and tablecloths. This has allowed her to provide for her children’s needs, as well as to support one of her daughters who recently divorced and found herself homeless with a small child.

At this time, she is in need of a loan in the amount of $275 to acquire more equipment for renting. You have the chance to help Rosa grow and continue to help her daughter. Don’t hesitate any longer. She needs your help and sincerely appreciates your support.

Translated from Spanish by Leo Duran, Kiva Volunteer.

Trabajadora, entusiasta y responsable son algunas de las características que definen a Rosa, ella se divorció hace algunos años, por lo que se quedó al frente de la manutención de sus 3 hijos, dada esta difícil situación decidió emprender su propio negocio con un poco de capital, la renta de sillas, mesas y manteles. Este le ha permitido brindarles a sus hijos lo necesario, además apoyar a una de sus hijas que se divorció de su pareja hace tiempo y se quedó desamparada con un hijo pequeñito.

Ahora ella requiere de un préstamo por la cantidad de $ 275 DLLS, mismos que serán destinados para la compra de más equipo para rentar. Tú tienes la posibilidad de ayudar a Rosa a crecer y poder seguir ayudando a su hija. No lo dudes más, ella te necesita y agradece tú a poyo sinceramente.

loans.use: Purchase equipment

loans.name: Elena Gerenarda

texts.en:
My name is Elena Gerenarda, and my principal occupation is in trade. I hope to start a traveling sales business of natural medicines. Since natural medicines are already popular with the people in my town, I hope to develop an even stronger customer base. The results of this business will help me contribute to familial expenses and to the ever-growing costs of my children’s education.

Translated from Spanish by Marco Alves, Kiva Volunteer.

Mi Nombre es Elena Gerenarda, mi actividad principal es el comercio, cuento con un negocio de venta de medicinas Naturales, el que distribuyo de manera ambulante, cuento con muy buena clientela ya que este producto tiene muy buena aceptación en mi ciudad, gracias a este negocio puedo contribuir con los gastos familiares, ya que cada dia los gastos soy mayores debido a que mis 4 hijos estan estudiando.

loans.use: To purchase medicines, aloe vera, chlorophyll, noni juice, deodorants, dental paste, calcium/magnesium, and vitamin E.

loans.name: Alida Sulay

texts.en:
Hello, my name is Alida Sulay, and I hope to start a home bakery. The revenue generated will cover familial costs and other obligations. I have devoted myself to this type of business for several years, and with its success I can provide my children with an education.

Translated from Spanish by Marco Alves, Kiva Volunteer.

Hola mi nombre es Alida Sulay, cuento con un negocio de reposteria ( productos de Consumo Humano) ubicado en mi casa de habitación el que me genera ingreso para cubrir los gastos familiares y otros compromisos, tengo varios años de dedicarmen a este tipo de negocio, gracias a el he podido dar educación a mis hijos.

loans.use: To purchase eggs, flour, margarine, sugar, miscellaneous paper products, yeast, vanilla, olive oil, and butter.

loans.name: Maricela Suyapa

texts.en:
Hello, my name is Maricela Suyapa, and I hope to start a small, home-based traveling sales company producing rosquillas in the center of my community. The revenue generated from this business will cover familial costs and other obligations.

Translated from Spanish by Marco Alves, Kiva Volunteer.

Hola mi nombre es Maricela Suyapa, cuento con una Micro Empresa de Elaboración de Rosquillas (productos para Consumo Humano) ubicado en mi casa de habitación en el centro de mi comunidad, producto que distribuyo de manera ambulante y que me genera ingresos para cubrir con los gastos familiares y ootros compromisos.

loans.use: To purchase corn, cheese, firewood, lard, raw sugar, butter, and margarine.

loans.name: Martha Lilian

texts.en:
My name is Martha Lilian, and my occupation is in trade. I hope to have a clothing store for all ages, where the product is sold both by order and by traveling sales person. I have devoted several years to this type of work, and I hope to generate revenue to contribute to familial costs and other obligations. Right now, I need to expand my business, especially because the school year, a time when the volume of sales is greatest, is fast approaching.

Translated from Spanish by Marco Alves, Kiva Volunteer.

Mi nombre es Martha Lilian, mi actividad Principal es el Comercio, cuento con un negocio de venta de ropa para todas las edades, la que distribuyo de manera ambulante y por encargo, tengo varios años de dedicarmen a este tipo de actividad la que me genera ingresos para contribuir con los gastos familiares y otros compromisos, actualente necesito surtir mas mi negocio ya que se aproxima la temporada escolar y el volumen de venta es mayor.

loans.use: To purchase pants, collared shirts, women’s and children’s clothing, undergarments, etc.

loans.name: Dilcia Maria

texts.en:
My name is Dilcia Maria, and my principal occupation is in producing rosquillas. I hope to start a small, home-based artisan company. I have several years of experience in this type of business. Being at home will allow me the opportunity to give proper attention to my family, and the generated revenue will contribute to familial costs and the education of my children.

Translated from Spanish by Marco Alves, Kiva Volunteer.

Mi nombre es Dilcia Maria, mi actividad principal es la elaboración de Rosquillas, cuento con un pequeña Micro Empresa artesanal, ubicada en mi casa de habitación, tengo varios años de experiencia en este tipo de negocio, el que me permite atender a mi familia y generar ingresos para contribuir con los gastos familiares y de educación de mis hijos.

loans.use: To purchase corn, cheese, lard, sugar, flour, etc.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en: Caroline runs a multipurpose shop in the village where she does hair -dressing, dressmaking and sells secondhand clothing for the community. She has participated in the TEACH lending skills programme of Kraban Support Foundation. She needs a loan of $525 from KIVA Tto expand her business.

loans.use: Working Capital

loans.name: Martha

texts.en: Madam Martha is a farmer. She produces lots of agricultural products such as garden eggs, green beans, black pepper, cabbages and lettuce among others. She has been trained in basic farm management skills using the TEACH lending methodology of Kraban Support Foundation. She wants a loan facility of $600 from Kiva to improve her business.

loans.use: Working Capital

loans.name: Richard

texts.en: Richard is a charcoal producer. He produces about 7 tonnage truck full of charcoal for a community where fuel wood is the main source of domestic energy. He has learned from the TEACH lending skills program that records keeping is a very important aspect in business development. He wants a loan facility  of $625 to strenghten his operations.

loans.use: Working Capital

loans.name: Maria Guadalupe

texts.en:
Lupita is 20 years old, single and lives with her parents and one of her sisters. Some time ago, she decided to start her own business, a home-based beauty salon. She works alone in the business and this has allowed her to look for growth opportunities. She has 6 years of experience as a stylist. After completing high school, she decided not to pursue a college degree and instead chose to become active in the business world. She began to study to become a beautician, while at the same time working in a salon to improve her skills and put her studies into practice.

She now needs a loan of $275 to purchase two chairs and a mirror, as well as to acquire more beauty equipment such as a flat iron and nail gel utensils. This will allow an increase in the services she offers and therefore in the number of clients. Please support Lupita — you have the opportunity, don't hesitate any longer.

Translated from Spanish by Leo Duran, Kiva Volunteer.

Lupita tiene 20 años, es soltera, vive con sus padres y una de sus hermanas. Ella hace tiempo que decidió comenzar con su propio negocio, una estética en su propia casa. Trabaja sola su negocio y eso le ha permitido buscar oportunidadades de hacerlo crecer. Tiene 6 años de experiencia como estilista, ya que al finalizar la secundaria decidió no continuar con el bachillerato sino convertirse en alguien económicamente activa y así comenzó a estudiar para cultora de belleza y al mismo tiempo que estudiaba trabajaba en un estética para aprender más y llevar lo aprendido a la práctica.

Ahora ella necesita de un crédito de $ 275 DLLS, lo utilizara para compra de dos sillas y un espejo, además de aumentar su equipo de belleza con una plancha de cabello y utensilios para uñas de gel, lo que traerá como beneficios incrementar los servicios que presta y así el numero de clientes. Decídete a apoyar a Lupita, tú tienes la oportunidad de hacerlo, no lo dudes más.

loans.use: Purchase equipment

loans.name: Elvia Patricia

texts.en:
Patty is 33 years old and is originally from Monterrey, Nuevo León. She is a married mother of two children. Some time ago she started her own auto parts shop, taking advantage of the knowledge and experience of her husband Oscar, who for many years has been employed by another auto parts store. Three years ago, driven by the need for extra income to supplement her husband's wages, and utilizing his experience in the field of auto parts, she decided to start her own business. At first her selection was small but it has been growing steadily along with size of the clientele.

She is in need of a loan of $475 to purchase a cabinet which will allow her to better display her products and also increase her inventory. Remember that Patty needs your support. You have the opportunity to help her, so don't hesitate. She will appreciate it always.

Translated from Spanish by Leo Duran, Kiva Volunteer.

Patty tiene 33 años, originaria D. Monterrey Nuevo León, es casada y madre D. dos hijos. Hace tiempo que inició su propio negocio, una refaccionaría, aprovechando los conocimientos y experiencia D. su esposo Oscar, quien durante muchos años ha sido empleado D. otra refaccionaría. Es así como hace tres años con la necesidad D. emprender una actividad que le generará un ingreso extra al sueldo D. sus esposo y con la experiencia que el tiene en el ámbito D. las refacciones decidió iniciar su negocio, el cual comenzó con poco surtido y ha ido creciendo poco a poco, incrementando también su número D. clientes.

Ella necesita un crédito para la compra D. un mueble que le permita exhibir mejor sus productos y también incrementar sus inventarios, por la cantidad D. $ 475 DLLS. Recuerda que Paty necesita apoyo y tú tienes la posibilidad D. ayudarla, no lo duD. más, ella te lo va agradecer siempre.

loans.use: Purchase equipment

loans.name: Victor Edgar

texts.en:
Victor is a public accountant, married and originally from Cuauhtemoc City, Chihuahua. He has lived for many years in Monterrey. He has 2 years of experience in his internet café business, which he began after losing his job with Mattel with the hope of becoming self-employed and owning his own business. The business has been growing steadily. In the beginning he only had three computers, and he currently has six.

He is now seeking a loan of $1,200 to purchase one additional computer and a higher-quality printer for his clients. This will allow an increase in the number of clients as well as in the quality of service he offers. Victor needs your generosity. Don’t hesitate any longer — he needs and sincerely appreciates your support.

Translated from Spanish by Leo Duran, Kiva Volunteer.

Víctor es contador público, casado, originario de Ciudad Cuauhtemoc Chihuahua, tiene muchos años viviendo en Monterrey, tiene dos años de experiencia con su negocio, un caber café, iniciando después de quedar desempleado cuando trabajaba para MATTEL y con la finalidad de tener su propio empleo y su negocio inició este que ha ido creciendo poco a poco. En un comienzo sólo tenía tres computadoras y actualmente ya tiene seis.

Ahora solicita un crédito de $ 1200 DLLS para la compra de una máquina más y una impresora con mejor calidad para sus clientes, lo que traerá como beneficio un incremento en el número de clientes y también en la calidad del servicio que les esta brindando. Victor requiere de tu generosidad, no lo dudes más, el necesita de tu apoyo y te lo agradece sinceramente.

loans.use: Purchase equipment

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy ingredients and equipment

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria I. is a very enterprising woman. She has dedicated herself for one year to the sale of jewelry, principally gold bracelets. She is requesting a loan of $1200 to buy merchandise. She plans to repay it in 12 months.

(Translated from the Spanish by Naomi Johnson, Kiva volunteer)

Maria I. es una mujer muy emprendedora, ella tiene 1 año dedicandose a la venta de joyeria, principalmente pulseras de oro, ella solicita $1,200.00 dllrs para Compra de mercancía y piensa pagarlo en un plazo de 12 meses.

loans.use: To buy merchandise

loans.name: Sonia

texts.en:
Sonia dedicated herself to the sale of semi-new clothing more than one year ago, and the business is going well. She is requesting a loan of $800 to buy more merchandise and in that manner increase her sales with greater variety of styles, sizes, and models. The loan will be repaid in 12 months.

(Translated from the Spanish by Naomi Johnson, Kiva volunteer)

Sonia se dedica a la venta de ropa seminueva desde hace mas de un año y el negocio a marchado bien, ella solicita un prestamo por $ 800.00 para comprar mas mercancía y de esa manera incrementar su venta con mayor variedad de estilos, tallas y modelos, el prestamo pretende pagarlo en 12 meses.

loans.use: To buy merchandise

loans.name: Oksana

texts.en:
Oksana is married with one daughter who is attending college. She is in the grocery sales business selling a variety of food products in the busy central market. She has two kiosks and hires a lady to help her with sales. Oksana has been a client with “Nadiya Ukraine” since 1999. She started her business selling tea and coffee at one of the local markets. She saved her money and together with loans from “Nadiya Ukraine” was able to expand, setting up a second kiosk in the central city market. She is an entrepreneur of integrity – very punctual and communicative. She manages a very brisk trade at her vending kiosks. Many loyal customers keep coming back because of Oksana’s friendly attitude, cheerful nature and willingness to serve them well. Oksana would like a loan for $1,200 to expand the range of food products she has available such as coffee, tea, candy, chocolates, mayonnaise, and vegetable oil. She is planning to purchase these groceries wholesale where she can get a good price. Income generated from Oksana’s business will allow her to invest more in her daughter’s education as well as provide a better living for her family which is her first priority in life.

Оксана – одружена, в неї є дочка. Вона навчається в університеті. Оксана продає харчі на центральному ринку міста. В неї два кіоски, в одному з них працює жінка, яку Оксана взяла на роботу в якості реалізатора. Оксана стала клієнткою „Надії України” в 1999 році. Вона починала з продажу чаю та кави на одному з місцевих ринків. Оксана використала власні заощадження та за допомогою позик від „Надії України” змогла розширити свою торгівлю, відкривши другий кіоск на центральному місцевому ринку. Вона – чесна, пунктуальна та комунікабельна. Торгівля біля її прилавків завжди дуже жвава. Багато покупців знову й знов повертаються по покупки до Оксани через її дружелюбну вдачу, щирість та бажання якомога краще обслуговувати клієнтів. Оксана хотіла б отримати позику в 1 200 доларів для того, щоб придбати більше товарів харчування, а саме каву, чай, цукерки, шоколад, майонез, олію тощо. Вона планує придбати продовольчі товари оптом для подальшої роздрібної торгівлі. Позика допоможе Оксані вкласти отриманий прибуток в освіту дочки, а також забезпечити кращий рівень життя для родини, яка завжди займала перше місце в житті Оксани.

loans.use: To increase the assortment of food products

loans.name: Zhanna

texts.en:
Zhanna is married with one daughter, Natasha, who is a college student. Zhanna’s store which sells men’s sweaters in the winter and T-shirts in the summer is located at one of the busiest city markets. She’s been in this business for 9 years. Zhanna is a serious and prudent business owner. Her perseverance together with lending services from “Nadiya Ukraine” has enabled her to gradually expand her business. Today Zhanna owns a store and three containers. Containers are large metal shipping containers often used for overseas shipping. They can be used for storage, but make an ideal shelter for market vendors sell merchandise from. In Nikolaev most market entrepreneurs own little stores or such containers. Zhanna’s working capital has grown from $6,000 to $15,000 since she received her first loan from “Nadiya Ukraine”. There are many vendors and competition in clothing sales is high, however, Zhanna’s pleasant manner and willingness to meet client’s needs have helped her keep loyal clientele. The fact that she accepts plastic credit or debit cards, which are gaining popularity in Ukraine, attracts even more potential clients to her business. Zhanna is requesting a loan of $1,200 to purchase an assortment of clothing items in bulk to sell in one of her container-stores. She is planning to buy warm sweaters, pullovers and jerseys that are in high demand in the cold winter season. Eventually, Zhanna plans to invest her profit into the construction of her own store building somewhere in busy, downtown Nikolaev. Her responsibility, stable business growth, and prompt payment record characterize Zhanna as a consistent and serious entrepreneur capable of loan repayment.

Жанна – одружена, в неї є дочка Наташа, яка навчається в університеті. Жанна торгує чоловічими светрами взимку та футболками влітку. В неї своя крамниця на одному з найбільших ринків міста. Жанна займається цим бізнесом вже 9 років. Жанна – серйозний та розсудливий підприємець. Її наполегливість у поєднанні з позиками від „Надії України” дала їй можливість поступово розширити торгівлю. Сьогодні Жанна є власницею крамниці та трьох контейнерів. Контейнери – це такі великі металеві споруди-склади, які часто використовуються в якості крамниць. В Ніколаєві більшість ринкових підприємців є власниками маленьких крамничок або таких контейнерів. З того часу, коли Жанна отримала свою першу позику від „Надії України”, розмір її робочого капіталу збільшився від 6 000 до 15 000 доларів. Багато підприємців на ринку займаються торгівлею одягом, тому конкуренція досить велика. Однак привітній Жанні вдається привабити покупців, тому що вона завжди намагається задовольнити вимоги своїх клієнтів та якісно їх обслужити. Той факт, що вона приймає в своїй крамничці пластикові картки, приваблює ще більше потенційних клієнтів до її бізнесу. Жанна просить про позику в 1 200 доларів для того, щоб придбати різний одяг для подальшого продажу в одному зі своїх контейнерів-крамниць. Вона планує придбати теплі светри, пуловери та кофти, які користуються попитом під час холодного зимового періоду. Жанна планує вкласти отриманий прибуток в будівництво власної крамниці в іншій частині міста. Її відповідальність, стабільне зростання бізнесу та відсутність прострочень підтверджують, що Жанна – серйозний підприємець і вона зможе сплатити отриману позику.

loans.use: To increase assortment of inventory

loans.name: Komi

texts.en:
Mr. Komi S. is a small farmer by profession. He is married and father to five (05) children, and works a large grove of oil palms. His wife, who works as a secondhand retailer, does not receive enough income to fully support the family. And so it was to meet all the family's expenses that Mr. S. invested his small savings in farming local land: leasing the farm, producing seeds, planting and caring for the palms until they produce their nuts. Palm nuts are very important for the population because they can be used to product palm oil, which is essential for cooking. Currently, Mr. S. is asking for $800 of financial support to expand his fields. The credit will allow him to pay for labor and to acquire the resources necessary to cultivate oil palms.

Translated from French by Lisa Molle, Kiva Volunteer.

Monsieur S. Komi est un paysan de profession. Marié et père de cinq (05) enfants, il exploite un grand domaine de palmiers à huile. Son épouse, une revendeuse de la place, ne dispose pas un revenu assez fort pour venir pleinement en aide à la famille. C’est pour être à la hauteur des dépenses que Monsieur S. Komi a investi sa petite économie dans l’exploitation des terres locales : bail de terrain, production de pépinière, plantation et entretien des palmiers jusqu’à la production des noix. Les noix de palmes sont très importantes pour la population car elles servent à la production de l’huile de palme indispensable pour la cuisine. Aujourd’hui, Monsieur S. sollicite un appui financier de $800 pour élargir ses champs. Le crédit lui permettra de payer la main d’œuvre et d’acquérir des intrants pour la culture des palmiers à huile.

loans.use: paying for labor and acquiring the resources needed for cultivating oil palms

loans.name: Abla

texts.en:
Married and the mother of seven (7) children, Mrs. Abla T. sells corn in her community. She is very dynamic, and stands out through her honesty and courage. Her business allows her to make a very large contribution to the household expenses; her husband, a retired teacher, cannot cover all of these expenses on his retirement pension. Mrs. T., who has a gift for managing her business with exemplary precision, was able to pay back her first credit without any difficulties. Now she is seeking to improve her business by increasing her stock of corn during periods when it is abundant and reselling it when it is in short supply. This new project requires more resources than Mrs. T. currently has. To achieve her goal, she is asking for a credit of $850 that will serve as capital to buy, store, and resell corn. The profit on the sales will help her to better meet the expenses of her household and acheive financial independence.

Translated from French by Lisa Molle, Kiva Volunteer.

Mariée et mère de sept (7) enfants, Madame T. Abla est une femme commerçante de maïs dans sa localité. Très dynamique, elle s’est fait remarquer par son honnêteté et son courage. A partir de son activité, elle contribue énormément aux charges de son ménage. Son mari, enseignant à la retraite n’arrive pas à couvrir la totalité des besoins avec sa pension de retraite. Douée d’une rigueur exemplaire dans la gestion de ses activités, elle a pu solder son premier crédit sans incident. Aujourd’hui, elle cherche à améliorer son commerce par l’agrandissement du stock de maïs en période d’abondance et le revendre en temps de pénurie. Ce nouveau projet nécessite assez de moyens dont ne dispose pas Madame T. aujourd’hui. Elle sollicite pour ce faire un crédit de $850 qui va lui servir de fonds de commerce pour l’achat, le stockage et la revente du maïs. Le bénéfice de la vente lui permettra de mieux couvrir les dépenses de son foyer et avoir une autonomie financière.

loans.use: Buying, storing, and reselling corn

loans.name: Ahoefa

texts.en:
Married to a fisherman, Mrs. Ahoefa H. is the mother of four (4) children and is also responsible for her own two (2) younger brothers and one of her husband's brothers. Her business is producing palm oil. This is a very profitable buisiness that allows Mrs. H. to contribute to the household expenses. Because of the high quality of oil she produces, she has so many customers that she can no longer supply them all. It takes a large amount of money to acquire palm nuts for preparing the oil. Since she does not have this money, Mrs. H. cannot put enough palm oil on the market. In order to fill this gap and improve her family's income at the same time, she is asking for a credit of $850 to purchase a supply of palm nuts and improve her production facilities. This will help her better meet the needs of her family.

Translated from French by Lisa Molle, Kiva Volunteer.

Mariée à un pêcheur, Madame H. Ahoefa est mère de quatre (4) enfants et a à sa charge ses deux (2) jeunes frères et un frère de son mari. Elle exerce comme activité la production de l’huile de palme. Cette activité est très rentable et permet à Madame H. de contribuer aux charges du ménage. De part la qualité de l’huile qu’elle produit, elle a une clientèle abondante qu’elle n’arrive plus satisfaire. Il faut des moyens importants pour l’acquisition des noix de palme en vue de la préparation de l’huile. N’ayant pas ces moyens, elle n’arrive pas à mettre suffisamment d’huile de palme sur le marché. Pour combler cette insuffisance et par la même occasion améliorer le revenu familial, elle sollicite un crédit de $850 pour s’approvisionner en noix de palme et améliorer son installation de production. Ceci lui permettra de mieux subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.

loans.use: buy a supply of palm nuts and improve her production facilities

loans.name: Svitlana

texts.en:
Svitlana is married with two teenage daughters. She owns a kiosk selling tea, coffee, chocolates and sweets at one of the biggest markets in the city. Her daughters willingly help her with the business which enables them to gain some practical skills as well. Svitlana has been a client of “Nadiya Ukraine” since 2002. She has proven to have the heart of an entrepreneur and is enthusiastic about her small business. Her integrity and good reputation make her a pleasant person to work with. She has received and repaid a total of 19 loans with “Nadiya Ukraine” without any delinquencies. Svitlana would like to get a loan of $1,000 to purchase additional products for her kiosk. She is planning to buy a variety of chocolate candy, and good quality teas and coffee from wholesalers who distribute these products to retail vendors. Svitlana recently lost her father and she incurred many expenses with the funeral. However, she is working hard to sustain her business and secure its expansion. This loan will enable Svitlana provide a wide range of food products for sale in her kiosk and will help guarantee consistent growth in her business which is key to her family’s well-being.

Світлана – одружена. В неї дві дочки підліткового віку. Вона – власниця кіоску, продає чай, каву, шоколадні цукерки та солодощі на одному з найбільших ринків міста. Її дочки допомагають Світлані з бізнесом, одночасно набуваючи практичні навички, які потім знадобляться їм в житті. Світлана працює з „Надією України” з 2002 року. Вона – чудовий підприємець, з великим ентузіазмом ставиться до своєї справи. Завдяки чесності та порядності Світлани з нею завжди дуже приємно працювати. Вона отримала та сплатила 19 позик в „Надії України” без жодних прострочень. Світлана просить про позику в 1 000 доларів для того, щоб придбати більше продовольчих товарів для свого кіоску. Вона планує закупити різноманітні шоколадні цукерки, якісні чай та каву оптом, для подальшої роздрібної торгівлі. Світлана нещодавно втратила батька, багато грошей треба було витратити на похорон. Однак вона наполегливо працює для того, щоб забезпечити стабільний розвиток свого бізнесу. Ця позика допоможе Світлані урізноманітнити асортимент продовольчих товарів в своєму кіоску, а також гарантуватиме зростання її бізнесу, який є запорукою добробуту усієї родини.

loans.use: To increase the assortment of products in her kiosk

loans.name: Afi Victoire

texts.en:
Mrs. Afi Victoire T. is a married woman and the mother of four (4) children. She is also responsible for her younger sister, who is an apprentice. Her husband, a carpenter, does not receive a very high income from his business. In order to be able to meet the expenses of her family, Mrs. T. produces doughnuts every day and then sells them along the side of the roads in her village. She is an assertive woman, very involved in community life, and was able to pay back her initial credit of $350 promptly and without any difficulties. She is hoping to receive a new credit of $650 to improve her business by buying a supply of wheat flour, sugar, oil, and firewood to produce her doughnuts. This credit will undoubtedly change the course of her entire family's life.

Translated from French by Lisa Molle, Kiva Volunteer.

Madame T. Afi Victoire est une femme mariée et mère de quatre (4) enfants. Elle a aussi à sa charge sa jeune sœur en apprentissage. Son mari, menuisier ne possède pas un grand revenu de son activité. Pour pouvoir supporter les charges de la famille, Madame T. produit quotidiennement des beignets qu’elle vend aux abords des routes de son village. Femme combative et menant une vie associative très animée, elle a su rembourser promptement et sans incident son premier crédit de $350. Elle espère bénéficier de ce nouveau crédit d’un montant de $650 pour améliorer son activité : s’approvisionner en farine de blé, en sucre, en huile et en bois de chauffe pour la production des beignets. Ce crédit changera à coup sûr le cours de vie de toute la famille.

loans.use: buy supplies of wheat flour, sugar, and oil to produce doughnuts

loans.name: Kossi

texts.en:
Mr. Kossi A. is a very dynamic young man. Married to a business woman and father of two children, he is also responsible for three of his younger brothers who are going to school. He supports his family by earning income from selling secondhand clothes and shoes. He started trading clothing when he was forced to leave school for lack of money. Fortunately, Mr. ATTINGON’s business is flourishing and he would like to expand it to increase his income and better support his family. He is thus seeking an $850 loan to increase the scope of his business to meet client demand as well as to reach markets beyond his town. This loan could improve his family’s living conditions, as well as his financial situation.

Translated from French by Liana Bianchi, Kiva Volunteer.

Monsieur A. Kossi est un jeune homme très dynamique. Marié à une commerçante et père de deux (2) enfants, il a à sa charge trois (3) petits frères en âge de scolarisation. Il réussit à nourrir sa famille à partir du revenu de la vente des friperies : vêtements et chaussures. Contraint d’abandonner les études à cause du manque des moyens, il s’est lancé dans ce commerce pour pouvoir se prendre en charge. C’est une activité très florissante et Monsieur A. compte l’agrandir aujourd’hui pour en tirer plus de revenu pour le bonheur de sa famille. Il souhaite alors avoir un appui financier d’un montant $850 pour agrandir la taille de son activité afin de répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle et avoir une possibilité d’aller sur des marchés plus grands que celui de sa localité. Ce crédit pourra améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille de même que sa situation financière.

loans.use: Sale of secondhand clothes and shoes

loans.name: Joséphine

texts.en:
Mrs. Joséphine A. is a young woman married for 10 years to a farmer and mother of four children. Although illiterate, she keeps busy by producing cassava flour called ”gari,” which is a popular local food. She is a dynamic woman who actively participates in social and economic interest groups. Because she cannot affort a modern grater, she is unable to produce enough flour with only manual labor. Today she is asking for a $700 loan to buy a new grater and cassava in order to increase production to meet local market demand. The production and sale of gari is a profitable enterprise which can help her improve her family’s living conditions.

Translated from French by Liana Bianchi, Kiva Volunteer.

Madame A. Joséphine est une jeune femme mariée depuis une dizaine d’année à un cultivateur et est mère de quatre (4) enfants. Analphabète, elle n’a aucun complexe à mener réellement son activité de production de la farine de manioc « gari ». C’est un aliment très apprécié par la population de sa localité. Elle est une femme très dynamique qui milite dans des groupes d’intérêt économique et social. N’ayant pas les moyens pour s’offrir une râpeuse moderne, elle n’arrive pas à produire suffisamment de farine car c’est une activité très pénible. Elle sollicite aujourd’hui un crédit de $700 pour acheter une râpeuse et disposer du fonds de commerce pour l’achat du manioc en vue de la production en quantité du gari afin d’être à la hauteur de la demande sur les marchés locaux. Très rentable, la production et la vente du gari pourront l’aider à améliorer les conditions de vie familiale.

loans.use: Purchase of grater for gari production

loans.name: Akossiwa

texts.en:
Married and the mother of three children, Mrs. Akossiwa E. also cares for her younger brother. Her husband is a farmer. Mrs. E. is known in the community for her doughnuts, which are recognized for their quality. Despite the fact that she is illiterate, she successfully managed and repaid her first loan. Her cleanliness is greatly appreciated and increases her clientele. In order to increase her daily doughnut production, she needs further financial means. This is why she is seeking a $600 loan to stock wheat flour, oil, and other necessities for doughnut production.

Translated from French by Liana Bianchi, Kiva Volunteer.

Mariée et mère de trois (3) enfants, Madame E. Akossiwa a aussi à sa charge son petit fils. L’activité principale de son mari est l’agriculture. Reconnue dans sa localité à travers la fabrication de beignets, Madame E. fait une production de qualité. Malgré son état d’analphabète, elle a eu à gérer son premier crédit qui a été soldé sans incident. La propreté dans son lieu de travail est appréciée de tout le monde et fait accroître sa clientèle. Pour augmenter sa production de beignet quotidienne, elle a besoin de plus moyens financier. C’est pourquoi elle sollicite un crédit de $600 pour s’approvisionner en sacs de farine de blé, huile et autres et autres nécessaires à la préparation des beignets.

loans.use: stocking of wheat flour, oil, and other ingredients for doughnut production

loans.name: Koyomé

texts.en:
A young married woman with two children, Mrs. Koyomé T. is known in her community as a reputable cooking oil vendor. She also cares for the three children of her sister, who died. Her husband is a public bus driver. At present, her business income isn't enough to provide for her household because capital is insufficient. At the same time, she can’t meet market demand and often runs out of stock. She is seeking a $750 loan which will finance the stocking of cooking oil in bulk to improve supply to her community. This loan will allow her to enhance her business and to improve her family’s standard of living.

Translated from French by Liana Bianchi, Kiva Volunteer.

Jeune femme mariée et mère de deux (2) enfants, Madame T. Koyomé est réputée dans sa localité pour la vente d’huile. Elle a à sa charge trois (3) enfants de sa sœur décédée. Son mari est un chauffeur de bus de transport en commun. A ce jour, le revenu de son commerce ne lui permet pas de contribuer efficacement aux charges du ménage car son capital n’est pas consistant. Au même moment, elle n’arrive pas à satisfaire toutes les demandes du marché et est souvent en rupture de stock. Elle sollicite ce crédit de $750 qui va lui servir de fonds de commerce pour s’approvisionner en quantité en huile pour une meilleure fourniture dans sa localité. Ce crédit lui permettra de rehausser son chiffre d’affaire et d’améliorer le niveau de vie de sa famille.

loans.use: purchase and resale of cooking oil

loans.name: Adjo

texts.en:
Mrs. Adjo D. is married with two children. Her husband is a taxi-moto driver. She has become an experienced fabric retailer, thanks to her dynamism and level of education. She had no problem managing and repaying two previous loans. In the textile trade, one must stock the latest patterns and designs. Otherwise, a retailer can easily lose clientele. The means that Mrs. D. has today don’t allow her to keep up with these trends to satisfy her demanding customers. To overcome this shortfall, she is seeking an $850 loan to enlarge her fabric display to meet market demand. This project’s financing will allow her to increase her income, which will have a positive impact on her family’s standard of living.

Translated from French by Liana Bianchi, Kiva Volunteer.

Madame D. Adjo est mariée et mère de deux enfants. Son mari est un conducteur de taxi moto. Revendeuse de pagne, elle a acquis une grande expérience dans le domaine grâce à son dynamisme et à son niveau d’instruction. Elle a eu à gérer deux fois de suite des crédits qu’elle a remboursés sans aucune difficulté. Le commerce de pagne est tel qu’il faut suivre le rythme des nouveautés qui sortent. Autrement, on perd facilement la clientèle. Les moyens dont dispose aujourd’hui Madame D. ne lui permettent plus de suivre ce rythme afin de pouvoir satisfaire des clients très exigeants. Pour pallier à ces insuffisances, elle sollicite un appui financier d’un montant de $850 afin d’agrandir son étalage pour satisfaire la demande du marché. Le financement de ce projet lui permettra d’améliorer son revenu qui aura un impact positif sur le niveau de vie de sa famille.

loans.use: purchase and sale of traditional fabric

loans.name: Kodjo

texts.en:
Mr. Kodjo N. is a dedicated young man. He is married and the father of four children. He was forced to end his studies in secondary school when he ran out of money. He completed a computer training course however, and thanks to his own efforts, has managed to purchase a used computer which allowed him to open a small word processing and computing shop. His good sense of work well done leads to high customer satisfaction among those who come to the shop. Currently he’s very much in demand but has only a single computer that no longer even works properly. He would like to equip his shop with more effective technology in order to meet demand. To do this, he is seeking an $850 loan to buy modern computers for more efficient data analysis. Mr. N. will then be able to earn enough money to take care of his family and to lead a more fulfilling professional life.

Translated from French by Liana Bianchi, Kiva Volunteer.

Monsieur N. Kodjo est un jeune homme très dévoué. Il est marié et père de quatre (4) enfants. Il arrêta ses études au cours secondaire parce qu’il n’avait plus de soutien. Il va faire une formation en informatique et grâce à ses efforts personnels, il arrive à acquérir un ordinateur d’occasion, ce qui lui a permis d’ouvrir un petit centre de traitement de texte. Ayant le sens du travail bien fait, il satisfait pleinement tous les clients qui passent dans le centre. Il est aujourd’hui très sollicité mais il n’a qu’un seul ordinateur qui ne fonctionne même plus correctement. Il souhaite doter son centre de matériel informatique plus performant afin de pouvoir être à la hauteur de la demande. Pour cela, il sollicite un crédit de $850 pour s’acheter des postes ordinateurs modernes pour un traitement plus efficace des données. De cette activité sortira un revenu qui permettra à Monsieur N. de s’épanouir et de prendre soin de sa famille.

loans.use: purchase of computers and accessories

loans.name: Akayivi

texts.en:
Akayivi E. is an energetic woman and the mother of six. She is married to a bike mechanic. Her main business is making and selling corn meal porridge in schools in the morning and then along the road in the evenings. Her husband makes less than she does when it comes to covering household expenses. That’s why Ms. E. helps to make ends meet with her income from selling porridge. A very kind and welcoming woman, she demands cleanliness, which has won her a large and loyal customer base. She has already repaid her initial loan without a problem and plans to bolster her business by seeking more substantial financial means. And so she is requesting a new loan of $600 to build a significant stock of corn. She can then make corn meal porridge upon demand. This will improve her income, as well as living conditions at home.

Translated from French by Daniel Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

Madame E. Akayivi, est une femme dynamique. Mariée à un mécanicien à 2 roues et mère de six enfants, elle a pour activité principale la préparation et vente de bouillie à base du maïs dans les établissements scolaires les matins, et aux abords des routes, les soirs. Le revenu de l’activité de son mari n’est pas aussi important pour prendre en charge tous les besoins du foyer. Pour cette raison, Madame E. Akayivi contribue aux charges avec les revenus de sa vente de bouillie. Très gentille et accueillante, elle est exigeante en matière d’hygiène, ce qui lui procure une abondante et fidèle clientèle. Elle a déjà remboursé son premier crédit sans incident. Elle a l’ambition de renforcer son commerce de bouillie et cherche un moyen financier pour consistant. C’est pour cela qu’elle sollicite un nouveau crédit de $600 qui va lui permettre de constituer un stock consistant de maïs afin de préparer sa bouillie à tout moment. Ceci améliorera ses revenus ainsi que les conditions de vie de son foyer.

loans.use: Making and selling corn meal porridge

loans.name: Kayivi

texts.en:
A. Kayivi is married and the mother of four. At home, she takes care of her young son. Her business selling smoked fish provides income and helps her husband, a farmer, to cover household expenses. She is a resourceful woman, and she applies everything she knows to her work, which results in a product of exceptional quality. Although there is an ever-increasing customer demand, she lacks the funds to meet it. And so she is requesting a loan of $650 to augment her production of smoked fish. The loan will be the capital for smoking fish to sell. The success of her business, which she calls «Bon Goût» (Good Taste) will allow her to improve her family’s living conditions.

Translated from French by Daniel Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

Mariée et mère de quatre (4) enfants, Madame A. Kayivi a à sa charge son petit fils. Elle exerce comme activité la vente de poissons fumés pour pouvoir disposer d’un revenu et contribuer aux charges du ménage avec son mari cultivateur. Femme ingénieuse, elle met tout son savoir-faire au service de ce travail, ce qui confère à la production une qualité exceptionnelle. Avec une demande de plus en plus croissante, elle n’a pas suffisamment de moyens pour satisfaire tous les clients. Elle sollicite un crédit de $650 afin de pouvoir augmenter sa production et satisfaire les demandes. Le crédit servira donc de fonds de commerce pour l’achat, le fumage et la vente du poisson. Le succès de cette activité lui permettra d’améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.

loans.use: To acquire, smoke, and sell fish

loans.name: Angèle

texts.en:
Angèle A. is a young woman and the mother of three. Her husbands, a carpenter by trade, does not have his own workshop and therefore lacks the income to cover household expenses. This is the situation under which Ms. A. has set up her truck farming activities cultivating food along the banks of the river that flows along her village. Her project is highly successful, but it needs a lot more work and financing to turn her business into a professional one, thus producing a greater benefit. To do this, she needs substantial financial means. And so she is requesting a loan of $650 to buy a motorized pump to facilitate the work. This will augment her production of produce to meet customer demands. The success of her plans will also allow her to increase family revenues and to improve living conditions at home.

Translated from French by Daniel Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

Madame A. Angèle est une jeune dame, mère de trois (3) enfants. Son mari, menuisier de profession, n’a pas un atelier de travail et par conséquent ne dispose pas de revenu lui permettant d’assumer les charges du ménage. C’est dans ce contexte que Madame A. a aménagé les abords du fleuve qui longe son village pour cultiver les produits maraîchers. C’est un projet très florissant mais qui mérite beaucoup de travail et de financement. Elle a l’ambition de rendre son activité professionnelle pour plus de rentabilité. Pour cela, il lui faut des moyens financiers importants. Elle sollicite à cet effet un crédit de $650 qui va servir à acheter une motopompe pour faciliter le travail. Ceci va augmenter la production maraîchère pour la satisfaction de la clientèle. Le succès du projet permettra également d’augmenter le revenu familial et d’améliorer les conditions de vie dans le ménage.

loans.use: To buy a motorized pump

loans.name: Kokouvi

texts.en:
Kokouvi A. is married, has six children, and is a farmer. Not fortunate enough to attend school, he very early on embraced working in the fields. Due to this work, he is somehow meeting the needs of his family. His wife, who makes and sells beignets (a kind of doughnut), also helps to support their household with her small income. Today, exhausted from crude farming methods, Mr. A. brings in less and less income, which has a negative impact on his household. He is requesting a loan of $700 in order to buy fertilizer and other soil amendments to augment his crop yields. All of this will then allow him to increase his income and improve his family’s standard of living.

Translated from French by Daniel Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

Marié et père de six (6) enfants, Monsieur A. Kokouvi est un agriculteur. N’ayant pas eu la chance d’aller à l’école, il s’adonne très tôt aux travaux champêtres. C’est grâce à cette activité qu’il assume tant bien que mal les besoins de la famille. Sa femme qui fait la préparation et la vente des beignets participe aussi aux charges du ménage avec son petit revenu. Aujourd’hui épuisé par une agriculture rudimentaire, Monsieur A. Kokouvi a un rendement de moins en moins important. Ce qui a un impact négatif sur le ménage. Il sollicite un crédit de $700 afin de pouvoir acheter des engrais et autres intrants pour augmenter le rendement de son champ. Tout ceci le permettra ainsi d’accroître son revenu pour une amélioration du niveau de vie de sa famille.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and other soil amendments to improve his crop yields.

loans.name: Akou Philomène

texts.en:
Akou Philomène A. is married and the mother of three, and she is also the guardian of two children from her deceased sister. In order to help support the household, she has devoted much of her energy to her business selling plastic kitchen items. This is a high growth sector of the market but demands a fair amount of financing. Lacking the means, Ms. A. has not been able to keep up with market trends. Thanks to her keen sense of management, she was able to repay all her previous loans without a problem. She is now requesting a new loan of $850 as capital to stock up on new plastic kitchen items, thus expanding the range of goods she offers. This will allow her to have substantial revenues for improving the living conditions of her family.

Translated from French by Daniel Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

Madame A. Akou Philomène est mariée et mère de trois (3) enfants et a à sa charge deux (2) enfants de sa sœur décédée. Afin de contribuer aux charges du ménage, elle s’investit beaucoup dans son commerce de vente des ustensiles de cuisine en plastique. C’est un secteur qui est très porteur mais qui demande assez de financement. Ce qui fait que Madame A. Akou Philomène n’a pas la capacité de suivre le rythme des nouveautés. Grâce à son sens aigu de gestion, elle a su rembourser tous les crédits qu’elle a obtenus sans aucun incident. Aujourd’hui, elle sollicite un nouveau crédit de $850 qui va lui servir de fonds de commerce pour s’approvisionner en de nouveaux ustensiles de cuisine en plastique afin d’agrandir son étalage. Ceci lui permettra de disposer d’un revenu consistant en vue de l’amélioration des conditions de vie de sa famille.

loans.use: To acquire and sell plastic kitchen items

loans.name: Amassanh

texts.en:
Amassanh A. is married and the mother of six. She is locally known through her business selling produce from her garden. A very courageous woman who likes to compete, she finds herself compelled to bear all family expenses, since her husband lacks steady employment. The income from her small business does not cover all her needs. Despite her drive and best intentions, she is currently held back, particularly by finances. She came up with the idea to apply for financial support to expand her business. The $600 loan that she is requesting will serve as capital for the business of selling the produce from her garden. Bolstering her business will thus bring living hope to her family.

Translated from French by Daniel Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

Mariée et mère de six (6) enfants, Madame A. Amassanh est connue dans sa localité à travers son activité de vente des produits maraîchers. Femme très courageuse qui aime se battre, elle se trouve dans l’obligation de prendre en charge toute la famille car son mari n’a pas d’emploi fixe. Le revenu de son petit commerce n’arrive pas à couvrir tous ses besoins. Malgré son ardeur et sa bonne foi, elle est aujourd’hui limitée par les moyens surtout financiers. Elle se propose alors de solliciter un appui financier pour élargir son commerce. Le crédit de $600 qu’elle demande va lui servir de fonds de commerce pour la vente produits maraîchers. Le renforcement de l’activité apportera un espoir de vivre dans la famille.

loans.use: Selling produce from her garden

loans.name: Afiwa

texts.en:
Afiwa K. is married and the mother of four. Her husband is a fisherman by trade. The family income is too low for her family to thrive. That is why Ms. K. entered the business of selling lamp oil to help her husband take care of the family. She builds up an inventory and sells the oil to households by the liter. The revenues from this business, though insufficient, go towards supporting her family. Ms. K. is asking for financial aid to boost her business. The $700 loan that she is requesting will serve to acquire a large stock of lamp oil to meet public demand in her area. Her sales numbers will improve thus benefiting her family.

Translated from French by Daniel Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

Madame K. Afiwa est mariée et mère de quatre (4) enfants. Son mari est un pêcheur de profession. Le revenu familial étant insuffisant ne permet pas l’épanouissement de la famille. C’est ainsi que Madame K. Afiwa s’est lancée dans le commerce du pétrole lampant pour pouvoir aider son mari dans la prise en charge des besoins de la famille. Elle s’approvisionne en quantité et le revend en unité par litre aux ménages. Les revenus de ce commerce quoi que insuffisants permettent de contribuer aux charges du ménage. Madame K. sollicite un concours financier pour renforcer son activité. Le crédit de $700 qu’elle demande va servir à l’achat et au stockage du pétrole lampant en grande quantité en vue de satisfaire la population de sa localité. Cette activité augmentera son chiffre d’affaire pour le mieux être de sa famille.

loans.use: Acquire and sell lamp oil

loans.name: Afi

texts.en:
Afi A. is the mother three, has responsibility for two younger sisters, and is married to a farmer. Given their insufficient family income, everyday life is hard at home. A very courageous woman, Ms. A. has built upon her experiences from her mother to start a business selling daily necessities in order to help cover household expenses. Among her display of goods can be found: canned food, soap, and other items. This woman deserves support, since her only wish is to be able to ensure that her children are educated. She is requesting a loan of $800 as capital to acquire basic necessities to sell. The loan will allow her to expand her display of goods, to improve her income, and to really take care of her family.

Translated from French by Daniel Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

Madame A. Afi est mère de trois (3) enfants et a à sa charge deux (2) petites sœurs. Mariée à un agriculteur, le revenu familial est très insuffisant et la vie au quotidien est difficile dans le ménage. Très courageuse, Madame A. Afi est partie de l’expérience reçue de sa mère pour se lancer dans la vente des produits de premières nécessités afin de contribuer aux charges son ménage. Sur son étalage on retrouve : les boîtes de conserve, les savons et autres. Cette femme mérite d’être soutenue car son seul désir est de pouvoir assurer l’éducation de ses enfants. Elle sollicite un crédit de $800 qui va lui servir de fonds de commerce pour l’achat et la revente des produits de première nécessité. Ce crédit va permettre d’augmenter son étalage, d’améliorer son revenu et d’assumer efficacement les besoins de sa famille.

loans.use: To acquire and sell basic necessities of daily life.

loans.name: Komi

texts.en:
Komi K. is married and the father of two. He is a great sculptor in his community. His wife has gone back to being a stay-at-home mom and therefore brings in no income. To address the needs of his family, Mr. K. puts all of his energy into sculpting. Noteworthy and valued for his fine work, he is disciplined and honest as well. All these qualities make him a trustworthy man, and more and more clients come to his shop. His initial loan of $400 was repaid without a problem.

Mr. K. is requesting a new loan of $800 to acquire more modern equipment and ebony wood for producing better artwork. He will also open a more effective workshop. With all these improvements, he is going to become a true artist and to be able to take care of his family.

Translated from French by Daniel Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

Marié et père de deux (2) enfants, Monsieur K. Komi est un grand sculpteur dans sa localité. Sa femme réduite à la fonction de ménagère n’apporte aucune contribution aux charges du ménage. Pour faire face à tous les besoins de la famille, Monsieur K. investit toutes ses énergies dans la fabrication de ses articles. Remarquable et apprécié de par la finesse dans ses travaux, il est aussi rigoureux et honnête. Toutes ces qualités font de lui un homme de confiance et reçoit dans son atelier une clientèle de plus en plus abondante. Son premier crédit de $400 qu’il a obtenu est remboursé sans aucun incident.

Monsieur K. sollicite un nouveau crédit de $800 pour acquérir un équipement plus moderne, du bois d’ébène pour une meilleure prestation de service et ouvrir un atelier plus performant. A travers cette activité, il va devenir un véritable artiste et prendre bien soin de sa famille.

loans.use: To buy art supplies and materials

loans.name: Enam

texts.en:
Enam D. is married, the mother of two, and has her young son at home. Her main business is selling smoked fish to provide for her family. She has an acceptable income because of the work she does and her disciplined management. But this woman has become the head of household since her husband died two years ago and is overwhelmed with family obligations. To find a way out, she would like to augment her production but lacks the financial means to do so. And so she is requesting financial aid in the amount of $700. This loan will go towards constructing a second oven for producing more smoked fish in order to improve the living conditions of her family.

Translated from French by Daniel Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

Madame D. Enam est mariée et mère de deux (2) enfants et a à sa charge un petit fils. Son activité principale est la vente de poisson fumé pour subvenir aux besoins de sa famille. La qualité de son travail et la gestion rigoureuse qu’elle en fait lui procure un revenu acceptable. Mais cette femme, devenue « chef de famille » à la suite du décès de son mari depuis 2 ans, est écrasée par les charges du ménage. Pour sortir de ces difficultés elle veut augmenter sa production mais ne dispose pas suffisamment de moyens financiers. Elle sollicite alors un concours financier d’un montant de $700. Le crédit qu’elle demande va servir à la construction d’un second four et augmenter la quantité de production en vue d’améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.

loans.use: To construct a second oven to increase her production of smoked fish

loans.name: Akouélé

texts.en:
Akouélé K. is the mother of four, and she takes care of her blind mother. Always persevering and a very devoted woman, she has a good teacher’s sensibility and struggles to see her children succeed. Her business involves selling groceries and beignets (a kind of doughnut). Since her husband died five years ago, all household expenses have rested upon her shoulders. She cannot support her family anymore, since the income from her business is no longer enough. Today, her business is in need of financing in the amount of $700. This loan would go towards augmenting her stock of flour and her production capacity. Given this opportunity, she would be able to increase her income and ensure the basic needs of her children, who were orphaned by the death of their father.

Translated from French by Daniel Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

Madame K. Akouélé est mère de quatre (4) enfants et a à sa charge sa mère devenue aveugle. Infatigable et très dévouée, elle a le sens d’une bonne éducatrice et se bat pour la réussite de ses enfants. Elle exerce comme activité la vente des denrées alimentaires et du beignet. Depuis 5 ans que son mari est décédé, toutes les charges reviennent à elle et elle n’arrive plus à les supporter car le revenu de commerce n’est plus consistant. Aujourd’hui, ses activités nécessitent un financement d’un montant de $700 pour augmenter son stock et sa capacité de production. Cette opportunité lui permettra d’accroître ses revenus pour assurer les besoins élémentaires de ses enfants orphelins de père.

loans.use: To stock up on wheat for making beignets

loans.name: Kayi

texts.en:
Kayi A. is married and the mother of four. She is in the business of selling various food items in her area in order to help with household expenses. She has gained a great deal of experience from her 10 years in this business. However, given her very limited financial means, she is faced with many customer orders that she cannot fill. She now needs financial support to strengthen her business, particularly for making and selling caramel sauce. The $700 loan that she is requesting will allow her to stock up on various items and to have a significant commercial inventory in order to increase her sales figures.

Translated from French by Daniel Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

Mariée et mère de quatre (4) enfants, Madame A. Kayi a pour activité la vente de divers aliments dans sa localité pour contribuer à la prise en charge des besoins de son foyer. Cela fait 10 ans qu’elle exerce cette activité et elle a acquis une grande expérience dans le domaine. Cependant, par ses moyens financiers très limités, elle est confrontée à beaucoup de demandes qu’elle est incapable de satisfaire. Elle a besoin aujourd’hui d’un appui financier pour renforcer son activité notamment la préparation et la vente du jus de caramel. Le crédit de $700 qu’elle demande lui permettra de s’approvisionner en divers produits et disposer d’un stock marchand conséquent en vue d’augmenter son chiffre d’affaires.

loans.use: To stock essential items for making and selling  caramel sauce.

loans.name: Ayéna

texts.en:
Ayéna B. is married and the father of four. A farmer by trade, he married a merchant of smoked fish who sacrifices every day for her children’s happiness. Mr. B. is a subsistence farmer. These days, soil degradation and the caprices of Nature continue to result in lower and lower crop yields. Despite his courage and self-sacrifice, it is hard for him to shield his family from hunger. At wit’s end, he is requesting financial support to revitalize his fields. The requested loan of $700 will serve to acquire fertilizer in order to produce more in future growing seasons. The income from the sale of his crops will allow him to take care of his family and to lead a peaceful life.

Translated from French by Daniel Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

Monsieur B. Ayéna est un homme marié et père de quatre (4) enfants. Cultivateur de profession, il a épousé une revendeuse de poisson fumé qui s’évertue au quotidien pour le bonheur de ses enfants. Monsieur B. pratique une agriculture de subsistance, et aujourd’hui, la dégradation du sol et les caprices de la nature font que les rendements sont de plus en plus médiocres. Malgré son courage et son abnégation, il lui est difficile de mettre sa famille à l’abri de la faim. Ne sachant plus à quel saint se vouer, il sollicite un appui financier pour relancer son activité. Le crédit de $750 qu’il demande va servir à s’approvisionner en engrais chimique afin de mieux produire les saisons à venir. Les revenus issus de la vente des produits permettront à Monsieur B. Ayéna de s’occuper de sa famille et de mener vie paisible.

loans.use: To stock up on fertilizer to improve crop yields

loans.name: Rissikatou

texts.en:
Rissikatou S. is a very dedicated young woman. She is married to a farmer, has three children, and is also the guardian of two little sisters, who are in an apprenticeship. She works hard to be able cover family expenses. Her business selling baby clothes does not bring in enough money, since she lacks sufficient financial capital. Although business is booming, Ms. S. is not altogether happy about it. To have enough income for her family, she needs new capital to bolster her business. That is why she is requesting a loan of $800 to lease a place as a boutique, to enlarge her display of goods offered, and to buy new goods in order to meet the needs of her customers.

Translated from French by Daniel Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

Madame S. Rissikatou est une jeune femme très dévouée. Mariée à un cultivateur, elle est mère de trois (3) enfants et a à sa charge deux (2) petites sœurs en apprentissage. Elle peine énormément pour couvrir les dépenses de sa famille car son activité de vente des habits pour bébé et enfants ne rapporte pas, son capital étant trop infime. Malgré que ce commerce soit très florissant, Madame S. n’en jouit pas convenablement. Pour disposer d’un revenu suffisant pour la famille, Elle a besoin du capital frais pour renforcer son activité. C’est pour cela qu’elle sollicite un crédit de $800 pour louer un local qui va lui servir de boutique et agrandir son étalage, acheter de nouveaux produits pour répondre aux besoins de sa clientèle.

loans.use: To lease a place as a boutique and to enlarge her range of goods for sale

loans.name: Sikavi

texts.en:
Mrs. Sikavi A. is married to a grower and is the mother of five (5) children. She did not have the chance for an education. She fights for the education of her children, so they won't have the same life as her. Honest and committed, she is one of the women of note in her village. Her main activity is the growing and sale of pineapples. This very profitable crop has always permitted Mrs. A. to provide for the needs of her children. A very scrappy woman, she has added the sale of cassava root flour to the sale of pineapples. Today, she wishes to increase the size of her pineapple field because the quality of the variety she grows means she is receiving orders from hotels in Lomé. She is asking for a loan of $700 dollars that she will use to pay workers and to acquire what's needed for the production of pineapples.

Translated from French by Susan Bell, Kiva Volunteer.

Madame A. Sikavi est une femme mariée à un cultivateur et mère de cinq (5) enfants. N’ayant pas eu la chance de s’instruire, elle se bat pour l’éducation de ses enfants pour que ces derniers ne connaissent pas le même sort qu’elle. Honnête et dévouée, elle est l’une des femmes de référence dans son village. Son activité principale est la culture et la vente d’ananas. Cette culture très rentable a toujours permis à Madame A. de pourvoir aux besoins de ses enfants. Femme très combative, elle joint à la culture d’ananas la vente de la farine de manioc (gari). Elle désire aujourd’hui agrandir son champ d’ananas car la qualité de la variété fait qu’elle reçoit des commandes depuis les hôtels de Lomé. Elle sollicite alors un crédit $700 qui va servir à payer la main d’œuvre et acquérir des intrants pour la production d’ananas.

loans.use: To pay workers and acquire what's needed to grow pineapples

loans.name: Nassouvi

texts.en:
Mrs Nassouvi D. is the mother of seven (7) children. Her husband, a grower by profession, doesn't have a fixed salary that would allow him to cover all the needs of the family. The high number of children constitutes a large burden that is overwhelming Mrs. D. and her husband. To withstand the burden, she works without letup selling palm kernels. Despite the fact that it is difficult work, she gives it her all so she can help her husband support the children. Despite all her determination, she has not yet been able to get the family out of its precarious situation. Mrs D. is looking for a loan of $750, that will allow her to increase her stock so she can respond to the demands of her clientele. This business provides an income that improves the living conditions of her family.

Translated from French by Susan Bell, Kiva Volunteer.

Madame D. Nassouvi est mère d’une famille de sept (7) enfants. Son mari, cultivateur de profession, ne dispose pas d’un revenu fixe qui lui permette de prendre en charge les besoins de la famille. Le nombre élevé des enfants constitue un poids important qui écrase Madame D. et son mari. Pour pouvoir supporter ce poids, elle travaille sans relâche dans la vente des palmistes. Malgré que ce soit un travail très difficile, elle s’y donne entièrement afin d’aider son mari à supporter les enfants. Mais malgré toute cette détermination, elle n’est pas encore parvenue à sortir de la précarité.
